txt.en:
'These Crawlers have been roasted to a fine... something.

'In any case, take this vile stuff to the hill-beasts. You will find the old gate into the valley occupied by the hill-beasts and drakes. A short way into these valleys you will find a small cave within which the Beast-mother is believed to make her lair.

'Place the roasted crawlers on the great stone just within the entrance to draw the creature out. It is then that you must strike!'
'Ha! Well done, Southron! I guess those rumours of the Beast-lord were false then - I had half expected you to face a mated pair of the horrid beasts!\n\n'Wait... do you hear something?'
The Great Beast

'Revolting stuff, is it not? But keep in mind, if you have got nothing else, you can live off it. Anyway, roasted it is even worse than raw, but the hill-beasts seem to like it.\n\n'Hold a few minutes while I cook up this lot.'
'Bring me the flesh of crawlers so that I may prepare it for the beast-mother.'
Collected crawler-flesh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You must slay the beast-mother!'

'I am most grateful for your intervention. I had heard rumours from the hunters that there might be a mated pair of those horrible creatures up in the hills, but I had dismissed them as folly.\n\n'Alas it was my own folly that drew the wrath of her mate down upon us and nearly cost us all our lives, please accept my sincerest apology and accept these tokens of my appreciation for saving my life.'
Placed roasted crawler-flesh
Tasgall has died!
Crawlers can be found in the general area not far north of Aughaire.\n\nHunt crawlers for their flesh and bring it back to Tasgall to be roasted.
Tasgall has survived the Beast-lord's assault!
Tasgall has roasted the crawlers you brought him. You can return to him to learn the next step in his plan to defeat the Beast-mother.

The rock in the hill-beast lair is at the entrance to the valley, not far north of Aughaire.\n\nTasgall has given you some roasted crawler-flesh, which you should bring to a certain rock in the lairs of the hill-beasts.
Having successfully defeated the Beast-mother, you should return to Tasgall's camp and speak with him.
You have defeated the vengeful Beast-lord and saved Tasgall's life. Speak with him.
Bring the crawler-flesh to Tasgall
Collect crawler-flesh ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Tasgall
Lure out and defeat the Beast-mother
Speak with Tasgall
Defend Tasgall
Speak with Tasgall

The strange hill-beasts have become a serious problem of late. It seems that they are ruled by a secretive matriarch who serves the drakes. If she can be defeated, perhaps the threat of the hill-beasts will fade.

'These hill-beasts are growing more and more dangerous. We have heard that their leader is a matriarch of their kind, secretive and cunning, who in turn serves the drakes. If we can lure out this beast-mother and defeat her, the other hill-beasts may be cowed or routed.

'We know that these beasts greatly prize roasted crawler-flesh. I would ask you first to hunt crawlers in the area, bring their flesh back to me to be roasted, and then take the meat out to the hill-beast lairs where we may draw out this mother of the beasts.

'Beware though -- while the crawlers are no great threat, the matriarch may be a foe beyond the power of any lone warrior to overcome.'
